summary: The implementation successfully covers most requirements with Internet Identity authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, Stripe checkout, order history, contact details in footer, and warm earth tone design. However, several acceptance criteria have gaps or partial implementation, particularly around order status progression (only Pending/Completed/Failed vs. Pending/Processing/Shipped/Delivered), payment failure page evidence, and cart persistence verification.

missing_requirements.requirement: Order status progression must support Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered
missing_requirements.reason: OrderHistory.tsx only handles 'pending', 'completed', and 'failed' status variants. No evidence of 'processing', 'shipped', or 'delivered' status values being used or displayed.

missing_requirements.requirement: User is redirected to failure page if payment fails
missing_requirements.reason: PaymentFailure.tsx component exists in modified files list and App.tsx routes to /payment-failure, but the diff summary is truncated and doesn't show implementation details or how users reach this page after failed payment.

missing_requirements.requirement: At least 8-10 sample computer products are pre-loaded
missing_requirements.reason: staticProducts.ts (truncated in diff) only shows 4 products (HP Laptop, Dell Desktop, Canon Printer, TP-Link Router). No evidence of 8-10 products being available.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetupModal component for collecting user profile information (name, email, phone)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest. The requirement was only for authentication and cart persistence, not user profile management beyond what's needed for checkout.

hallucinated_features.description: StripeSetup component with admin interface for configuring Stripe credentials
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Non-goals: Admin dashboard for product management'. The StripeSetup admin interface for configuration goes beyond the requested Stripe integration scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Static catalog enrichment system merging backend products with static product data
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested. REQ-2 requires backend to store and serve product data. The hybrid approach with static catalog enrichment was not specified.
